# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Ensure that the burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using inserter entities but having no source items
-  Ensure that the inserter entities have a source of items to insert before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using furnace entities but having no ingredients
-  Ensure that the furnace entities have the necessary ingredients to process before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using steam engine entities but being not connected
-  Ensure that the steam engine entities are properly connected to the power grid before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using electricity group entities but being not plugged in electric network
-  Ensure that the electricity group entities are properly plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
